column1: To whom RT @NBCNews: The IRS says it has already paid out $207B in coronavirus stimulus checks as of Wednesday.

>@NYCMayor said today that NYC had met a goal of moving 6K people from shelter to hotel rooms & will now move 1000 per wk But 3,500 of the 6K people already lived in hotels before coronavirus. Nearly all are staying in shared rooms ~11K remain in shelter
